TextLibrary.Text: Queen Gwendholyn
Back so soon? All was well in Siria I hope?
Back so soon? All was well in Siria I hope?
Back so soon? All was well in Siria I hope?
Back so soon? All was well in Siria I hope?
My father had a gift for me from my late grandfather. He found it and wanted to pass it along.
My father had a gift for me from my late grandfather. He found it and wanted to pass it along.
My father had a gift for me from my late grandfather. He found it and wanted to pass it along.
My father had a gift for me from my late grandfather. He found it and wanted to pass it along.
Your grandfather... wasn't he...
Your grandfather... wasn't he...
Your grandfather... wasn't he...
Your grandfather... wasn't he...

Yes, Your Majesty. He was the one who claimed on his deathbed that he had been mortally wounded battling skeletons. He was an old man and perhaps a little crazy. The walking dead have not been seen in Agaria for many centuries.

Yes, Your Majesty. He was the one who claimed on his deathbed that he had been mortally wounded battling skeletons. He was an old man and perhaps a little crazy. The walking dead have not been seen in Agaria for many centuries.

Yes, Your Majesty. He was the one who claimed on his deathbed that he had been mortally wounded battling skeletons. He was an old man and perhaps a little crazy. The walking dead have not been seen in Agaria for many centuries.
I don't believe he was crazy. I have heard more than one rumor about such things this last year.

Your Majesty?
Your Majesty?
Your Majesty?
Your Majesty?
Do not give it any thought. You should return to your training if you are to become a valued member of the palace guard. Eveline has been waiting for you to return.

I will go at once.
